AquaticMod:Ahoy.NAME: Ahoy
AquaticMod:Ahoy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose 4 Strength.
AquaticMod:Ahoy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose 6 Strength.

AquaticMod:BombsAway.NAME: Bombs Away
AquaticMod:BombsAway.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add 2 Depth Charges to the bottom of your deck.
AquaticMod:BombsAway.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add 2 Depth Charges+ to the bottom of your deck.

AquaticMod:Compression.NAME: Compression
AquaticMod:Compression.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each card in your hand. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

AquaticMod:DepthCharge.NAME: Depth Charge
AquaticMod:DepthCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:FishFlip.NAME: Fish Flip
AquaticMod:FishFlip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

AquaticMod:IcicleWall.NAME: Icicle Wall
AquaticMod:IcicleWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Thorns. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:Lure.NAME: Lure
AquaticMod:Lure.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Thorns.

AquaticMod:MineField.NAME: Mine Field
AquaticMod:MineField.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! Mines to ALL enemies.

AquaticMod:Nuke.NAME: Nuke
AquaticMod:Nuke.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Mines to a random enemy.

AquaticMod:Pearl.NAME: Pearl
AquaticMod:Pearl.DESCRIPTION: Deep. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:RogueWave.NAME: Rogue Wave
AquaticMod:RogueWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Swim.

AquaticMod:ShrimpyStrike.NAME: Shrimpy Strike
AquaticMod:ShrimpyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, Upgrade this permanently.

AquaticMod:SunkenChest.NAME: Sunken Chest
AquaticMod:SunkenChest.DESCRIPTION: Deep. NL Gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:TorpedoStrike.NAME: Torpedo Strike
AquaticMod:TorpedoStrike.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have Swim. NL Deal !D! damage.

AquaticMod:Typhoon.NAME: Typhoon
AquaticMod:Typhoon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. Exhaust.
AquaticMod:Typhoon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. Exhaust.

AquaticMod:WideNet.NAME: Wide Net
AquaticMod:WideNet.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Gain Entangle.

AquaticMod:WringOut.NAME: Wring Out
AquaticMod:WringOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose ALL Swim.
